ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(NSSales_Probability__c*100 = 0) , NOT(NSSales_Probability__c*100 = 25), NOT(NSSales_Probability__c*100 = 50), NOT(NSSales_Probability__c*100 = 75), NOT(NSSales_Probability__c*100 = 100) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Probability percentage. Valid percentages are as follows: 0%,25%,50%,75%,100%.
